Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24795 affecting package rubygem-yajl-ruby for versions less than 1.4.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-24795 affecting package rubygem-yajl-ruby for versions less than 1.4.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package rubygem-yajl-ruby is earlier than 1.4.3-1, affected by CVE-2022-24795
